DERBY-1595: Network server fails with DRDAProtocolException if a BLOB with size 2147483647 is streamed from client
Switched from int to long when dealing with scalar streams, which can be longer than Integer.MAX_VALUE and cause arithmetic overflow. Introduced 'nullIndicatorSize' to duplicate less code.
